p: It is assumed that abdominal contraction is induced by local peritoneal receptor activation which includes prostanoids mediators. In the result peritoneal fluid, PGE2, PGF2, and Lipooxygenase are increased in mice. The nociceptive properties of acetic acid may be due to release of cytokines, TNF-α, interleukin- 1β, interleukin-8, and resident peritoneal macrophages and mast cell. In the present study in order to determine the inhibitory effect of the alkaloids on fever ( Küpeli et al., 2002).
